description.narrative: Conflict Prevention Mediation and Women in Political Processes: 1. Lessons from Mediation: Commission case study on mediation in Syria covering the efforts of Annan and Brahimi. 2. Breaking the Ice: Roundtable and publication of an outcome document on Nago rno Karabakh and Transdnistria, Options paper on future governance on Eastern Ukraine. 3. Negotiating Exits from Violent Economies: practices for dealing with criminal groups and develop guidelines for mediators, meeting in Geneva, Case studies 4. Women in Mediation and Peace Processes: Publish a study of the role of women in peace negotiations across regions evidence-based understanding of the impact of women?s participation in peace processes. Examine barriers and obstacles and to bring women to the peace table. Building on IPI?s successful Women Peace + Security Event Series to promote dialogue on research findings including: Policy forum on gender equality and peaceful societies, High-level report launch on women in conflict mediation and peace processes , Event to mark the 15th anniversary of Resolution 1325. 5. Arab Forum for Citizenship in Transition (FACT) - Continue implementing empirical research and advocacy activities under following: Gender Equality and the Constitution, Perception and Practice of Citizenship with a focus on Women?s Rights, Women?s Political Participation and Voting Patterns in Egypt and Tunisia, Citizenship and the Media examining portrayals of women?s activism and advocacy in various media in Tunisia.Conflict Prevention Peace Ope rations and Peacebuilding: 1. Targeted opportunities to feature African perspectives across its ad-hoc convening. 5. 21st Century Peacebuilding: Internati onal Expert Forum: 1.
